programme.title: Berita Tengah Malam
programme.desc: Saksikan berita yang memaparkan perkembangan terkini, isu-isu semasa dalam dan luar negara.(n)

programme.title: Tiang Dimensi

programme.title: Wira Remaja
programme.desc: Menggarap hal-ehwal remaja Malaysia, dari segi jatidiri, sikap, semangat, aspirasi motivasi dan kejayaan mereka dalam menjalani kehidupan.(n)

Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!(n)

He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.(n)

programme.title: Hollywood in Vienna - A Tribute To James Horner
programme.desc: In this edition of Hollywood in Vienna, conductor David Newman and the ORF Vienna Radio Symphony Orchestra set off to discover fascinating new worlds. The journey starts with music to the futuristic movie Metropolis. Accompanied by its big city-sounds we are entering the world of science fiction. After our first high-altitude flights with Steve Bramsons Impressions of Space Mountain we are ready to take off to extra-terrestrial space.(n)

Xiao Shu eventually finds out that Gao Fu Shuai's dream is to surpass him academically and becomes first position in the school. 直树希望在回到2035年之前，能替朝伟与小童完成梦想。他替朝伟编写了舞台剧，实现他当男主角的梦想。他与小树也让小童与父亲享用了梦寐以求的家常菜。小树最后也发现高富帅的梦想，就是在学业上超越他，成为全校第一….(n)

programme.title: 阿莫的日记 Diary Of Amos Lee - EP 11
programme.desc: In order to cope with the mock test, Amos' mum trains him with her extreme methods. A miserable Amos stumbles upon the re-examination question papers with Alvin. Amos is in a dilemma when Alvin encourages him to peek at the papers together. In order to pass, will Amos succumb to the dark side? Will Miss Ho find out? 为了应付模拟测验，李妈妈对Amos进行魔鬼式训练，让Amos苦不堪言。一次偶然，和Alvin一起捡起了重考试卷。Alvin一再怂恿，要Amos和自己一起偷看，令Amos顿时陷入了天人交战。为了及格，Amos会不会屈服于黑暗面？和Alvin同流合污呢？老师又会不会发现呢？.(n)

programme.title: 三把刀 King Of Culinary - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Last week, pastry chef Tai Boon Heng came on to the show for the first time. He is a man of few words but managed to leave an impression on the judges with his professional performance. Can Chef Pung keep his knife safe in the face of such a strong competitor? This week, the aroma of Nonya dishes lingers. Chef Eric Neo is famous for his delectable sauces, but in the face of a challenger who is adept at whipping up Nonya dishes, who will be the final victor? (重)上星期，糕饼师傅戴文兴首度登场。他话不多，但表现倒是不俗，令评审赞好。到底Chef Pung能不能保住他的第三把刀不拱手让人？这星期，摄影棚也飘来阵阵娘惹香。Chef Eric Neo很会做酱料可说是众所周知，这次和对娘惹料理了如指掌的民间高手比拼，最终到底会鹿死谁手？.(n)

programme.title: 最强岳母 Mightiest Mother-In-Law - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Swayed by Evon's words, Shuhui backs out at the last minute after agreeing at first to fund Hongzhe's Chingay project. Hongzhe is disappointed in her. Ke'en deems it a waste for Hongzhe to simply drop out of the project. She is willing to lend him the money he needs, to help him showcase his talent for lighting design. He is grateful. Hongzhe and Shuhui's relationship take a turn for the worse. She sees Ke'en's name card in his pocket and discovers he has been making frequent phone calls to her. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)可恩认为宏哲不应埋没才华，愿意借钱给他完成梦想，宏哲感激之下，瞒着淑慧偷偷与她合作。两人频繁接触，令淑慧怀疑他搞外遇，当众羞辱可恩，还在网上抹黑她，并要宏哲退出合作计划。宏哲为了家庭和谐，无奈答应。.(n)

programme.title: 最强岳母 Mightiest Mother-In-Law - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Ke'en confesses to Hongzhe. He feels guilty yet shaken at the same time. Truth be told, Ke'en has a psychological problem and enjoys being the third party of a marriage. Her psychologist Zhongming urges her to stop, but Ke'en refuses to halt her plans until Hongzhe falls for her. (PG)(重)可恩突然向宏哲告白，宏哲感错愕，却开始动心，却不知这一切都是可恩的阴谋。原来她患有心理病，曾经感情受创，导致有当小三的癖好，专向已婚男人下手，以破坏别人家庭为乐。心理医生忠鸣劝她收手，可恩说只要宏哲爱上她，她就会收手。.(n)

programme.title: 一家之宝 Our Family Joy - EP 5
programme.desc: Shane Pow visits an inter-ethnic family who enjoys sports and outdoor activities. He "babysits" the 2 kids experiencing parenting life for his first time. Knowing that Rezal and his wife love camping, Shane arranges a glamping session, while the 2 kids help out with decor and food preparation. 谁说有了孩子，就得牺牲玩乐、放弃旅行？异族夫妻Rezal和Wynn每周末都排满户外活动，让2个孩子跟着他们一起冒险玩乐。他们每年也会带两宝出国，体验房车自驾游的公路之旅。本集节目，热爱运动的包勋评探访了这家人，最后决定与2个孩子一起策划特别的露营活动，送给父母一个难忘的回忆。.(n)

programme.title: 与你澳游 Aus-some Getaway - EP 1

When the whole family goes to Kusu Island to make wishes, he meets an elderly woman who sells him tissue packets with wishing coins inside. She says they can make his wishes come true. Shanmei encourages Yaozong to make a wish with the coin and a miracle happens! (PG)(重)中年汉赵耀宗在马场当助理驯马师，工作不如意，三个孩子也总是让妻子善美操心。一次全家到龟屿岛上许愿，一个卖纸巾老婆婆向他兜售装有"愿望钱币"的纸巾，表示可以让他实现愿望。善美鼓励耀宗向"愿望钱币"许愿，奇迹竟然发生！.(n)

(重)国恩陪伴敏妃接受化疗，德伟则忙碌地联络德国教授，希望可以找到治疗敏妃绝症的方法。敏妃因为化疗副作用而掉发、呕吐等，但仍坚持继续上班，让自己没有时间乱想。不料病人得知敏妃正接受化疗，却对她的医术有所怀疑。.(n)

He puts forward bold plans at conferences but someone is (1B) 唐明的球友们食物中毒，他与徒弟把他们送到附近的明成北医院急症室求医。见到急症室忙得不可开交时，身为医生的唐明很想帮忙，但因他是别间医院的医生所以不能越界。(1C) 明成北副院长逸滔决心推行医疗改革。他多次在会议提出大胆方案，但却有人与他对着干。唐明与洛雯合力完成手术。事后逸滔召见洛雯，要她作出一个重要决定。.(n)

programme.title: 寻花探草 Sr 1 Garden Of Treasure S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: "Garden Of Treasure " is a documentary on the healing functions and botanical characteristics of wild flowers and herbs which can also be used to cook simple and delicious flower dishes. 《寻花探草》是以药草拍摄为主的纪录片，介绍他们心目中的百搭花草，逐一分享花草的药疗功能和植物特性, 也化成一道道简单好味的花草料理。.(n)

programme.title: 家和万事兴 Lee's Family Reunion - EP 216
programme.desc: (R) Passed down from generation to generation, the Li Ji Cake Shop has a hundred-year history to boast about. However, though the Li family look happy on the outside, there are conflicts aplenty behind closed doors. (PG)(重)《李记饼铺》代代相传已有百年，看似幸福美满的三代同堂，其实暗潮汹涌。老太爷李万世育有二子，长子再传留在饼店里帮忙，私生子再兴则流落在外，生活潦倒。主演：黄少褀饰高天诚，六月饰陈慧心，韩瑜饰李正男，方文琳饰罗秀琴。.(n)

programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 93
programme.desc: Shun Shui accuses Boris of using his connections to have Ke Ai as spokesperson. Boris denies and reprimands Shun Shui for not acknowledging Ke Ai's hard work and warns him that his temper and ill-feelings will cause him to lose her. 可爱拍代言广告，顺水去探班，遇到Boris。顺水感觉Boris言谈中有奚落他之意，便不客气地回击，指可爱能得到代言，一定是Boris帮忙的。Boris否认，反指顺水不认同可爱的努力，并警告顺水会因自卑和嫉妒而失去可爱。.(n)

programme.title: 小鲤鱼历险记 The Adv Of Little Carp - EP 10
programme.desc: The beautiful Carps Lake suffers the scourge of the evil snake. The small Carp Pao Pao was forced to swim out of his desolate homeland in search of the power of the dragon. He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. 美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.(n)

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes (HD) - EP 3
programme.desc: Shanmei is worried that if she passes away due to her sickness, her children would not be independent enough to support themselves. She cries in the arms of Huijing who tries to comfort her, but is seen by Yaozong. Yaozong misunderstands and confronts Huijing. In Shanmei's attempt to stop this, she falls unconscious to the ground. Huijing then reveals the truth about Shanmei's sickness and Yaozong is devastated! (PG)善美见子女们都不长进，担心自己一旦病逝，子女们无法自力更生，在前来安慰她的辉京怀里痛哭，被耀宗看见。耀宗误会辉京乘虚而入，与他发生冲突。善美极力阻止，结果昏迷倒地。辉京这时才透露善美患癌症的真相，耀宗感震惊！.(n)

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 18
programme.desc: Jianzhong dies in a car accident, Siyun suspects Dewei is the mastermind behind the accident. Zhiyi warns Siyun that these are all conjectures and she has no evidence. 建中车祸身亡，思云怀疑建中的意外是德伟造成。芝仪提醒思云这只是她自己的猜测，没有真凭实据，不能乱说话。芝仪还说这个世界没有永远的秘密，如果德伟真的做了亏心事，一定会被揭发。.(n)

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 351
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. 赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.(n)

programme.title: 下一站。遇见 Hello Miss Driver - EP 14
programme.desc: Yu Lin drinks alone in Yi Yang's cafe, thinking back of her quarrel with Liu Yi. Liu Yi said that she is not as good as Chen Xi. She holds the wine glass tightly in anger and blames Chen Xi for causing all the unhappiness. She breaks the glass when she loses control and cuts herself. Yi Yang helps her to apply medicine when he sees it. Yu Lin becomes attracted to Yi Yang. 宇琳在一阳的咖啡馆喝闷酒，想起与刘毅吵架的事，刘毅口口声声指宇琳比不上晨曦。想到这里，宇琳愤怒地握着酒杯，认为一切都是晨曦造成的。她在情绪激动下，将酒杯打破，割伤了自己。一阳见状，急忙帮她敷药处理，宇琳对一阳不禁动了心。.(n)

programme.desc: Professor Chaos is a villain who creates capsule monsters out of children's bad habits and uses them to turn dreams into nightmares. programme.desc: (R) Do you know our MRT trains need to pass through various checks before they can be delivered? (重)你们可知道我们的地铁是需要通过重重关卡，才能顺利出厂，运来新加坡的吗？让我们跟随特派员黄靖轮到新地铁的秘密制造基地见证地铁是如何经过各种测试之后，才踏上前来新加坡的旅程，最终又怎么抵达它们的新家落户….(n)

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 1
programme.desc: Being ill-tempered and ruthless, Karaket is loathed by her fiance, Det, and future mother-in-law. Unable to stand the sight of love rival Janwad fawning over Det, Karaket orders her servant to capsize Janwad's boat, but Janwad's maid is drowned instead. (PG)(首播)佳拉洁性格暴躁、粗鄙狠毒，并不被未婚夫德特和未来婆婆喜欢。佳拉洁看不惯情敌珍华向德特频频献殷勤，决定采取手段，指使仆人去掀翻珍华的船，导致珍华的侍女落水身亡。.(n)

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 2
programme.desc: Det and his family suspect Karaket is the culprit. They decide to find out the truth. Ketsurang, who lives in the present, meets with a car accident, and wakes up in the past in Karaket's body. (PG-部分画面令人不安)德特一家怀疑佳拉洁是凶手，决定找出真相。身处现代的佳苏兰，遭遇一场车祸，灵魂穿越时空回到了古代，附在佳拉洁身上。.(n)

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 Puzzle Masters - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Puzzle Masters is the ultimate competition for any young undiscovered puzzle wizards who are looking for a challenge and want to be mentored by the best Puzzle Masters the world has to offer. It scours the nation to find the cleverest, smartest, most complete puzzle solvers. 100 budding apprentices are invited to take part in the competition, and faces tough tests in 6 categories: inductive reasoning, calculation, observation, memorization, spatial thinking, and creativity. (重)江苏卫视推出的一档大型脑力偶像竞技真人秀，由王峰、王昱珩、鲍橒担任队长，刘国梁担任战术指导，陶晶莹担任常驻嘉宾，每期还有特邀明星嘉宾的加入。第一轮挑战就是晋级30强的百人淘汰赛，一百位选手同台比赛，最终只有30人成功晋级挑战赛，其余选手全部淘汰出局。.(n)

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore Sr 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and English)(R) Beyond the neon lights and grungy streets, Geylang and its outskirts are treasure chests of secrets. Peifen stumbles upon a little-known Association with links to a lost village. Later, while following the lead from an 1836 map, Peifen uncovers an antique treasure, that's at least a century old. And, meet a family that's been living in a Geylang bungalow since the 1940s! (重)(双声道-中/英)搜密新加坡第二系列节目带你穿街走巷寻访被遗忘的历史、私密的隐匿处、有趣的人物和另类工作，给你满满的惊喜！追随主持人的脚步踏上任务之旅，一起破解谜团、搜寻不为人知的地点、走访有趣故事的人物及探索本地让人咋舌的事项。.(n)

programme.title: 生活达人 Life's Perfectionists S10 - EP 1
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm. (重)(双声道-中/韩)本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.(n)

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) With rising youth unemployment, top university graduates in Seoul compete to take high stakes entrance exams, so as to secure a once in a lifetime stable job at conglomerates. A young mother is willing to put in 16 hour days, 7 days a week so as to raise the family's standard of living. For an increasing number of elderly abandoned to live in the slums, they're caught in a vicious cycle, jobless and depressed, then death by suicide. Witness the underbelly of Korea through the workmen's lives! (重)韩国顶尖大学学的学生为何在毕业前，急着备考挤进财阀工作？ 要多努力工作才能买房？年轻妈妈和丈夫为创业每星期工作7天，每天16小时。许多老年为什么沦落在贫民窟，等待救赎？疲惫的韩国人要如何在首尔成就大国梦？.(n)

programme.title: 消失中的亚洲食物 Vanishing Foods - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Made with a sauce that takes 30 days to perfect. An ingredient, 'grago' shrimp, that money often can't buy because of sporadic supply. All the reasons why a Singapore Peranakan braised pork dish, Babi Tohay, is vanishing. Chef Malcolm Lee, of Michelin-starred Candlenut Restaurant, shares his secrets (重)(最后一集)娘惹料理“发酵猪肉” (Babi Tohay) 是一道需要用三十天才能发酵的酱汁来烹调的佳肴。其中一种食材，小虾，因为稀有而货源不足，有钱也经常无法买得到。这也是为什么这道传统佳肴会逐渐消失的原因。.(n)

programme.title: 退休地图 Retiring in Paradise - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Tony Hung brings audience into the retirement world and introduce the different countries suitable for retirement at affordable costs. (重)洪永成带着观众的退休梦，亲身寻访地图上既符合大家预算，又可轻松退休的地方。.(n)

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 29
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Wu Chun tells Malu that she was adopted. Malu encourages her to register her DNA to look for her biological parents as they could have been looking for her all these years. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴春向马陆透露她是被领养的。马陆劝吴春去登记遗传基因寻找亲生父母。吴春顾虑美达和秋天的感受，又担心自己当年是被遗弃的，不敢找亲生父母。马陆说吴春的父母可能已经找她二十年了，鼓励吴春迈开第一步。.(n)

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 30
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Wu Chun is informed that her DNA matches with another registered party. However, her hopes of locating her biological family are dashed when the other party does not show up at the police station. Wu Chun blames Malu for causing her disappointment. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴春被通知有人跟她的遗传基因吻合，满心期待地到警局与该人见面。吉秀同样接获通知，但因为害怕而没有赴约。吴春失望，觉得自己当初一定是被遗弃的，怪马陆怂恿她去登记遗传基因结果一场空。.(n)

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 1
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Huijing works as a doctor in the Hospital Emergency Unit. Her amazing skills extend to bringing gangsters under control. She was brought up by her granny after her father abandoned her and a rascal in her high school days. Once, on the day she transferred to a new school, she got caught by her teacher, Hong Zhihong, when she was stealing a CD... (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)在医院急症室当值的女医生刘慧静身手了得，连黑帮都能制服。高中年代的她却是被父亲抛弃后由奶奶照顾的小混混。在转校那天，慧静在影音店偷CD时，遇上了她的老师洪智弘。。。。。。.(n)

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 2
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R)Huijing and Zhihong run into a fainted pregnant lady on the street. They attend to the lady and bring her to a hospital. After the incident, Huijing puts away her prejudice and grudge towards Zhihong. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)慧静和智弘在街上偶遇时，正碰上经过孕妇晕倒，两人协力抢救孕妇时，慧静总算放下了一直以来对智弘的成见和较量对立的情绪，一起送孕妇去医院。。。。。。.(n)

"中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.(n)

programme.desc: (R) Heavily influenced by Portuguese colonial masters and African slaves, discover the roots to Brazil's national flavours! (重)巴西菜深受葡萄牙和非洲饮食影响，这段渊源从何说起？巴西自称“烧烤”盟主，聚餐接待外宾为什么都选择烧烤？一起跟随李心钰到南美洲，从著名的《猪肉黑豆饭》和《海鲜烩汤》认识巴西人桑巴的奔放与浪漫！.(n)

programme.desc: (R) Men do not show their fragility in front of women and what women perceive is the strong image portray by the men. However, research reveals that men do have their weak moments! What are some of the views from the men and is it true that women are the stronger one in today's context? (重)男人往往都很少在女人面前表现自己脆弱的一面，而女人看到的都是男人坚强无比的外表。但是调查显示，原来男人也有脆弱时刻！Man爆的男嘉宾对于课题有什么见解？现今社会，难道女人才是强者？.(n)

She is hesitating whether to betray Shangwu and hand it over to Yunli to stop Shangwu from committing more crimes. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)尚武即将升职，到那时候影像部将会解散，致原与他的员工正积极寻找尚武犯罪的证据，阻止他升职。宝娜在家中握着一个U盘，内藏有尚武收了回扣的证据。她在犹豫是否要背叛尚武，把它交给允利以阻止尚武继续犯罪。.(n)

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 78

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 13
programme.desc: After the events of the previous episode, Pepper manages to apprehend the pimp responsible for the girl kidnappings to the police. Pepper and the girls of Pegasus company are immediately being recognized and commended for their heroic act. Now that she has a following, Pepper's talent agent advised her to quit the army in order to focus on her newfound fame. (PG)(大结局)Pepper和女兵们顿时成为了英雄，尤其是Pepper，因为她是Influencer的关系，许多商家突然跑出来要找她代言。Pepper之前的经理人，Ivy，很是开心，觉得当初叫Pepper加入军队是正确的。她告诉Pepper，目前很多商家对Pepper感兴趣，甚至还找她拍电影，Pepper已经是人气 number one 的 influencer了。她们希望Pepper继续做Influencer的事业。但在兵营这么久，Pepper已经喜欢军队的生活了，也觉得军队改变她很多，所以一时也难以取舍。另一方面，Hulk又再度表白。Pepper要选建东还是HULK呢？.(n)

programme.title: 长命百二岁 第二辑 As Long As You Live S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: "As Long As You Live II" continues to explore and understand how seniors are treated and what are the available options for seniors in countries like Netherlands, Switzerland, Germany, Canada and the USA. 全球人口老化，人生下半场越来越长，第二辑《长命百二岁》进军欧美，引领观众用新思维面对「老」问题。 「百二岁」参观荷兰的「失智村」和德国的「幽灵巴士站」，了解照顾认知障碍长者的窍门。节目去瑞士取经，探讨近年兴起的「时间银行」概念，透过服务长者换取老来有人照顾自己。采访队又帶大家窥探美国「冷冻人」的奥秘。.(n)

programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. programme.title: 边缘老人 Twilight Years - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) In the Philippines, a large number of children were born out of wedlock to Filipino women and U.S. Servicemen during the Vietnam War. They are living in poverty, experiencing discrimination for growing up without a father. This episode documents the elderly lives of them who are now remain impoverished. (重)越战期间，大批美军到菲律宾驻扎，并和当地女性在合法婚姻体制外，生下许多混血儿；美军父亲完成任务后回国，却丢下单亲的孩子，在歧视、仇恨和贫困中成长。这群美亚后裔而今也年过半百，他们在过着怎样的生活.(n)

programme.title: 已读不回 Blue Tick - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Zhou Daowen was frightened after receiving a message from the deceased Fangxing. He told Sidong and Nianxia that Fangxing died in a car accident on the way to the airport to fetch him. Daowen was no longer a suspect. Sidong and Nianxia went to look for Fangxings girlfriend He Chuen and Peng Xiyu. The three women could tell they all liked Fangxing. Sidong realized his former friend was a playboy and convinced Nianxia to let go of the past... Sidong and Nianxia went back to Hong Kong to look for the other funeral attendees, but bumped into one of Fangxing's former girlfriends, Li Kaixin, who sneaked into his house to steal money. Li Kaixin was shocked to find out Fangxing was online, crossing herself out from the suspect list. Sidong and Nianxia met up with Hu Deying and Song Haoran, Song Haoran knew what they were there for instantly, and warned them not to investigate further. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)原来胆小怕事的周稻文，收到方行的讯息，被吓傻了。思冬与念夏从稻文口中得知，方行当年赶往机场接稻文而发生交通意外丧生。稻文没可疑，思冬与念夏找方行女友何楚恩，及另一出席者彭喜愉，三个女人互相都看得出对方喜欢方行。思冬发现好兄弟竟是花心郎，替念夏不值，劝其放下。念夏决定回香港继续调查，思冬跟随。 思冬与念夏回港约见其他葬礼出席者，但竟在方行家遇上其临时女友李凯欣上来偷钱。李凯欣对方行「上线」反应奇大，似乎不是制造「已读不回」的人。思冬与念夏再约见了胡德英和宋皓然，宋皓然不待二人道明来意，已知为了「已读不回」，警告二人不要再追查。念夏认定「就是他」，撇下思冬，独自跟踪宋皓然。.(n)

programme.title: 非常监狱 Extraordinary Prisons - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) What is a prison without bars? Iwahig Prison in Palawan, Philippines is one of the largest open-air prisons in the world, with an area of almost a third of Singapore. Over 2000 prisoners roam free within the compound, and a select few even live in their own homes with their families. (重)“无围墙的监狱”还能称得上是监狱吗？位于菲律宾巴拉望岛的Iwahig监狱，是世界上最大的开放式监狱之一，面积将近新加坡的三分之一。超过两千名囚犯能在监狱范围自由活动，甚至有些和家人住在自己盖的楼房中。.(n)

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 9
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Shizhen brings Taijun to the hospital to visit Wancai and introduces Taijun to her family. Youjing looks down on Taijun's background and is certain that Taijun is making use of Shizhen to climb up the social ladder. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)世珍带泰俊到医院探望万才，并向家人介绍泰俊是她的结婚对象。幼京对泰俊的家世背景很不满意，觉得泰俊是想利用世珍出人头地。.(n)

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 2
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Because there are 2 people with the same name - Wu Haiying, Daojing mistook Haiying as his runaway girlfriend, pretty Wu Haiying. Daojing ruined Wu Haiying's marriage and caused Taizhen to be imprisoned. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)因两个同名同姓的吴海英，道京误把吴海英当做是他的溜跑的女友，毁掉吴海英的婚事也害韩泰振入狱。.(n)

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Xiuchang is worried about Duying when his progress with Shina seems too fast. Shina tries to win Xiuchang over by telling him untrue stories about how she is treated badly at home as she is an illegitimate daughter. The kind-hearted Xiuchang graciously accepts Shina into the family. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)度英和世娜的进展神速，秀昌担心单纯的度英受骗，要度英提防世娜。世娜为了尽快跟度英结婚，夺取洁姿美妆的商业机密，故意在秀昌面前扮可怜，令善良的秀昌接纳她。.(n)

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 4
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Xianji understands that Shenghe has not been giving financial assistance to Shina and her mother for years, but Shina claims to have graduated from university. Xianji is thus suspicious of Shina's background and what she has said so far. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)贤基听说胜赫在世娜成年后就没有再汇钱给世娜和她母亲，世娜却声称自己是大学毕业生。贤基质疑世娜如何有钱缴付大学学费，对她的背景起疑。.(n)

programme.title: 周公找茶 Dennis Uncovers - EP 13
programme.desc: When Dennis -- our well-known Radio DJ cum comedian -- invites his celebrity friends over for "kopi", expect a no-holds-barred conversation. As the caffeine takes effect, Dennis works on uncovering secrets from his guests. His guest celebrities are not just restricted to famous personalities in show-business, they include among others successful people from the world of sports, arts and fashion. Set in a cafe where cameras are almost not in sight, recording starts the moment Dennis steps in. 曾经太过年轻，开录音室烧光50万、创业遇人不淑，伟菘回忆往事情绪激动.(n)

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 33
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Shan'ni exposes Enlan's drugs-related activities at the celebration ceremony of Li He's 10th anniversary as Emperor. Enlan orders her men to blow up the venue in a bid to escape. Shan'ni could have left unhurt, but she turns back to help Li He and ended up injured herself. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)珊妮在李赫上任的十周年庆典公开太后在听琴岛种植罂粟花，并把毒品卖给全国人民的秘密。恩兰为了自保，命令手下引爆炸弹。珊妮本来可以离开会场，但回头营救李赫，结果自己也受伤。.(n)

programme.title: 身在异乡非异客 Strangers At Home - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) The British colonial period in the 19th century saw many South Asians arriving in Hong Kong and contributing to society through the years. Some have returned home; others call this land home. As they look different, their integration journey hasn't always been smooth. Our host examines their lives. (重)早在19世纪就已经有许多南亚裔人随着英国殖民政府来到香港，也曾经为建立香港这个大都市作出贡献（警探等的职务）。许多南亚裔人士落叶归根回到了印度与巴基斯坦，也有许多决定落地生根在香港建立家庭。他们虽然土生土长，但因为黝黑的肤色，深邃的五官，始终很难融入当地社会。这一集的节目将会走访不同职业的香港人，看看这群香港南亚裔的道地港式生活。.(n)

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) In South Korean history, there is a pioneer female royal doctor called "Da Chang-Jin", who created superb imperial cuisine for the king. As host Michelle Chia savours the tales of Da Chang-Jin's life, she discovers the delectable and nutritious tastes of these old royal recipes. (重)韩国史书上记载的首位女御医大长今，熔古铸今，创造出超群绝伦的宫廷御膳。珍馐美馔，不仅是一国之君调理养身的基石，更是舌尖上的一大欢飨。遵循《大长今》故事细腻的笔触，谢韵仪将探索韩国宫廷御膳料理的奥妙。.(n)

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 10
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Taijun arranges to meet up with Na-yan. He is shocked to see Na-yan with a little girl. Taijun does not know what to do next when he finds out from Manting that the little girl is his daughter. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)泰俊安排跟娜妍见面，却发现娜妍带着一名小女孩赴约。泰俊质问满婷，发现满婷故意要娜妍向他隐瞒新星的出生。泰俊不知如何是好。.(n)

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 3
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Haiying's parents decide to sever their ties with Haiying due to her strange behaviour and think she is crazy. Haiying and Daojing bump into each other in the bar, and she informs him about the wedding cancellation, making Daojing feel more guilty. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海英的行为异常，海英的爸妈决定抛弃海英因他们认为女儿疯了。海英和道京在酒吧里相遇后，海英首次对别人说出了自己被悔婚的真相，弄得道京更内疚。.(n)

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 5
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Jiaying plucks up her courage to tell Zhenghan about her liking for him. Zhenghan rejects Jiaying as he does not want to enter into a relationship with a client. The discouraged Jiaying stays at home for two whole days to sort out her feelings. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英鼓起勇气跟正韩表白，但正韩说不希望跟客户牵扯感情，因此拒绝佳英。难过得佳英在家睡了两天两夜后才振作起来。.(n)

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 6
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Jiaying hears from Zhengbin that Zhenghan was badly hurt in his last relationship. Jiaying tells Zhenghan that she will wait for him to recover before they start a new relationship. Zhenghan is shocked by Jiaying's gestures. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)佳英从正彬那儿听说正韩之前受到很严重的背叛。佳英尝试了解正韩的心情，告诉正韩她会等他走出伤痛才谈感情。正韩惊讶。.(n)

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 10
programme.desc: Taiwanese indigenous children's choir VOX Nativa has made waves around the world with their aboriginal music. By making their voices heard, the conductor hopes to bring about positive change in the lives of these children from poverty-stricken native communities and preserve their culture as well. 发迹于玉山下的原声童声合唱团让全世界听见了台湾的声音。在万人瞩目的背后，却是一场深具意义的偏 乡教育实验。指挥马彼得想借着假日音乐学校，翻转部落复制贫穷的命运。他的教育理念真的能够改变部 落，为孩子们带来幸福吗？.(n)

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 34
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Li He goes back to the island to rescue those prisoners who are kept captive by En'lan. En'lan kills Li He without knowing that she is shooting at her own son. (PG13-暴力镜头)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)李赫伪装到听琴岛上搭救那些被太后囚禁的人，自己却被恩兰的手下逼到死角。恩兰不知道搭救囚犯的人是李赫，结果亲手开枪杀死李赫。.(n)

programme.title: 料理人生 Magic Chef - EP 5
programme.desc: Xiao Xi has hurt herself while trying to find the missing ingredients of her folk remedy. Feeling sorry for her, David sends her home. He is shocked to discover that her grandmother was actually his childhood culinary inspiration. Xiao Xi is very moved when David personally cooks fried rice for her. 晓溪为了找回偏方材料弄伤了自己。大为于心不忍，送她回家时，意外发现晓溪外婆正是他儿时的烹饪启蒙老师。大为更亲手炒了蛋炒饭给晓溪吃，让晓溪感动万分。.(n)

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 11
programme.desc: Ep 11: Na-yan finally meets up with Taijun. Na-yan wants to bring Taijun to see Xinxing, but Taijun initiates a break-up with her instead. Not only does Taijun speak to Shizhen in Na-yan's presence, he also tries to get rid of her with money. Ep 11: 泰俊终于跟娜妍见面。娜妍发现泰俊已经知道新星的存在，于是要带泰俊去见新星，但泰俊却跟娜妍提出分手，不仅在娜妍面前跟世珍通电话，还要给娜妍钱打发她。.(n)

programme.title: 又是吳海英 Another Miss Oh - EP 4
programme.desc: Haiying and Daojing end up living in the same house with a thin wall between them. Daojing did not like it, so not only did he orders Haiying to move out, he also quarrelled with the homeowner. Daojing felt guilty after his brother, Pu Xun, yelled at Wu Haiying over the phone. Subsequently, Daojing changed his attitude towards Haiying and lets her continue to stay in the warehouse. 海英搬进了道京房子旁边的仓库里居住。道京不喜欢，不但命令海英搬走，还跟房东吵了起来。道京因朴勋在电话大骂海英后大感悔疚，除了让海英继续住在仓库，也改变了对她的态度….(n)

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 7
programme.desc: Ep 7: Xianji is suspicious of Shina's identity as his mother told him before that she had ran Shina down with a car. Shina submits blood and hair samples from Xianji and Shenghe for a paternity test and lies that that test is done with her samples and that the test has proven that she is Shenghe's child. 贤基的母亲当年临终前曾经告诉贤基她开车撞死了胜赫的私生女。贤基因此怀疑眼前的世娜到底是谁。世娜知道贤基对她的身世起疑，于是故意将贤基的血液样本当成是自己的，跟胜赫的头发送去做亲子鉴定，然后拿鉴定报告。.(n)

programme.title: 爱到最后 Love To The End - EP 8

She is worried that her background and past relationship with Zhenghan will come to light should Zhenghan get closer to Jiaying. 正韩跟佳英约会，问佳英要不要跟他一起到意大利追求梦想。佳英一口答应，两人在度英和世娜举行婚礼的礼堂接吻，被世娜看到。世娜担心自己的身世和跟正韩之前的关系会曝光，于是命令正韩跟佳英分手。.(n)

programme.desc: "Eureka Moment China" is an explosive and larger than life gameshow in which two couples go head to head testing their knowledge and coming face to face with a raft of dangerous stunts and wacky experiments. 《加油！向未来》是中央电视台推出的科学实验节目，由央视创造传媒有限公司制作。节目共11期，由撒贝宁、张腾岳主持，邓楚涵为解题人。每期节目明星将和观众代表一起，通过实验竞赛，为加油队和未来队赢取科学奖励，获胜队将赢得当期最终大奖（北极圈科考之旅）。.(n)

programme.title: 30分钟煮一餐 Quick Cuisine - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Career is still pretty much a dominant part of Singaporeans' lives. As such, most Singaporeans resort to eating out rather than going home to enjoy a sumptuous home-cooked meal. Working mothers always aspire to let their children and family enjoy a nutritious home-cooked meal. Hence, Quick Cuisine offers to inform all on how to prepare a meal in 30 minutes or less. (重)人们经常在外用餐，其实心里都非常渴望吃家常菜，尤其是忙碌的职业妇女虽然有女佣代劳，难得下厨，不过她们其实也很希望在特别的日子里，为家人和孩子准备美食。因此，为忙碌的专业和工作人士提供容易处理而且又营养丰富的食谱和烹饪秘诀，将会广受欢迎。.(n)

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 13
programme.desc: After the events of the previous episode, Pepper manages to apprehend the pimp responsible for the girl kidnappings to the police. Pepper and the girls of Pegasus company are immediately being recognized and commended for their heroic act. News of her heroism also attracted more followers to Pepper's social media channel and brands are now interested to endorse her. Now that she has a following, Pepper's talent agent advised her to quit the army in order to focus on her newfound fame. Pepper和女兵们顿时成为了英雄，尤其是Pepper，因为她是Influencer的关系，许多商家突然跑出来要找她代言。Pepper之前的经理人，Ivy，很是开心，觉得当初叫Pepper加入军队是正确的。她告诉Pepper，目前很多商家对Pepper感兴趣，甚至还找她拍电影，Pepper已经是人气 number one 的 influencer了。她们希望Pepper继续做Influencer的事业。但在兵营这么久，Pepper已经喜欢军队的生活了，也觉得军队改变她很多，所以一时也难以取舍。另一方面，Hulk又再度表白。Pepper要选建东还是HULK呢？.(n)

programme.title: 长命百二岁 S2 As Long As You Live S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: "As Long As You Live II" continues to explore and understand how seniors are treated and what are the available options for seniors in countries like Netherlands, Switzerland, Germany, Canada and the USA. 全球人口老化，人生下半场越来越长，第二辑《长命百二岁》进军欧美，引领观众用新思维面对「老」问题。 「百二岁」参观荷兰的「失智村」和德国的「幽灵巴士站」，了解照顾认知障碍长者的窍门。节目去瑞士取经，探讨近年兴起的「时间银行」概念，透过服务长者换取老来有人照顾自己。采访队又帶大家窥探美国「冷冻人」的奥秘。.(n)

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 10
programme.desc: Taiwanese indigenous children's choir VOX Nativa has made waves around the world with their aboriginal music. By making their voices heard, the conductor hopes to bring about positive change in the lives of these children from poverty-stricken native communities and preserve their culture as well. 发迹于玉山下的原声童声合唱团让全世界听见了台湾的声音。在万人瞩目的背后，却是一场深具意义的偏 乡教育实验。指挥马彼得想借着假日音乐学校，翻转部落复制贫穷的命运。他的教育理念真的能够改变部 落，为孩子们带来幸福吗？.(n)

A learning disability can cause a person to have trouble learning and using certain skills. Learning disabilities (LD) vary from person to person. There is no 'cure' for learning disabilities. With the right help, children with LD can and do learn successfully.(n)
